name: Good Soup
description:
Michael Rodent. Visionary. Chef extraordinaire. Rat. Help Michael cook the perfect soup to feed his fellow rats using only the finest ingredients the sewer can offer. But Beware! Some of Michaels brethren can be quite impatient. Slap them away before the ruin the soup with their grubby hands. 

Good Soup is a prototype intended to be played with an alternative controller. The game was created over the course of four days for Sheridan College's Fall 2022 Design Week Challenge.

Up, Down, Right, Left - stir soup

Space - slap rat

A - Add water

W - Add Vegetables

S - Add Tentacle
